name: Haker
description:
This game is an experiment to conect 2 game genres: clicker and heighscore.

This prototype was built in five days on BrackeysGameJam, the theme of which was "It is NOT Real".  In my opinion, the game refers to the subject by referring to hacking in Hollywood style.

Due to a problem with Web build bug, there is a downloadable version for  Windows on the site, I will try to fix this error, but now I encourage you to download and try the game on your computer.
